Agrypnos:Floristry.NAME: Floristry
Agrypnos:Floristry.FLAVOR: A place for any flower to shine.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw a #yFlower from your deck.

Agrypnos:Floriculture.NAME: Floriculture
Agrypnos:Floriculture.FLAVOR: Of all the fields of study, none are as pleasant as the field of flowers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, draw a #yFlower from your deck. NL Trigger the growth of a random #yFlower in your hand at the start of each turn.

Agrypnos:Greenhouse.NAME: Greenhouse
Agrypnos:Greenhouse.FLAVOR: Too small to actually grow any plants inside.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, trigger the growth of a random #yFlower for each unused energy.

Agrypnos:War Drum.NAME: War Drum
Agrypnos:War Drum.FLAVOR: The drums of war are nothing, if not steady.
DESCRIPTIONS: If the same number of cards are played two turns in a row, gain [E] at the start of the next turn.

Agrypnos:Flower Pot.NAME: Flower Pot
Agrypnos:Flower Pot.FLAVOR: It is dull and empty, but a beautiful flower can grow here.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #ySeed to your hand.

Agrypnos:Miniature Garden.NAME: Miniature Garden
Agrypnos:Miniature Garden.FLAVOR: A garden for a traveler. Or, anyone else, I guess.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, discard all #yFlowers. #yFlowers no longer lose their growth when played.
